column2: Cheeseburger in paradiseHeaven on earth with an onion slice  Not too particular, not too precise I'm just a cheeseburger in paradise
This man has made a vow of sanctity and celibacy.
This woman has made a vow of sanctity and celibacy.
This man has been distinguished with devout sanctity and purity.
This woman has been distinguished with devout sanctity and purity.
Some may inbibe nature's bounty, light up...
You bring out the bud with a select few, and you light up. The bud gives you the munchies and a feast naturally follows.
That really took the edge off.
That really took the edge off.
